headline.main: China to Strengthen Defenses, No Word on Budget
headline.print_headline: China to Strengthen Defenses, No Word on Budget

lead_paragraph: U.S. Attorney General Jeff Sessions will reply in writing to Senate Democrats' questions about his meetings with Russia's ambassador last year, the Justice Department said on Friday after a top Republican denied Democrats' request for a public hearing.
